name: Lakshmi Dev Bowen
what_you_do: Lakshmi is focused on the ripple of inspiring others, and how they can then inspires others themselves. She teaches and practices yoga, and is centered on people being disconnected by their divinity of purpose and inner peace. She does coaching, speaking, writing and retreats to help especially women heal from their past and find inner peace.
who_you_serve: Women who've been through hell and back and seek acceptance outside of themselves, leaving them feeling disconnected and deeply desiring inner peace.
social_proof: Over 10,000 hours of teaching experience as a Yoga Instructor
business_focus: Helping women heal from past trauma and find inner peace through yoga, coaching, speaking, and retreats.
